snippet.title: HYPERFIGHT - v2.0 Trailer
snippet.description:
HYPERFIGHT is a free-to-play fighting game where every hit is lethal, and every win counts. Now with 6 characters and online multiplayer!

Play it on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1005870/HYPERFIGHT/
Or on itch.io (no online multiplayer): https://hypersnow.itch.io/hyperfight

Follow for more updates: https://twitter.com/joh_dev
